title: cmd/go: package names are printed to stderr instead of stdout on build
body:
When passing the -v flag to the go build command, package names are printed to stderr instead of stdout.

Offending code line.
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/9d0239771a2ddd77be0ba64c2782e1328a378190/src/cmd/go/build.go#L845
